sentences.english: Had to wear long pants, but still hold tight the shoulders.
sentences.chinese: 只好穿上長衣長褲，卻仍然抱緊雙肩。

sentences.english: If I had a petticoat or pantalettes, I'd use them.
sentences.chinese: 如果我有條裙子或者長褲，我就會用我的。

sentences.english: The only drawback is they can only be worn with pants.
sentences.chinese: 唯一的缺憾是他們只能搭配長褲穿。

sentences.english: The Propper Tactical Trouser will not fade, wrinkle or shrink.
sentences.chinese: PROPPER戰術多袋長褲不會褪色，起皺或收縮。

sentences.english: Cover your skin with tightly woven long-sleeved shirts, long pants and wide-brimmed hats.
sentences.chinese: 穿織的密一些的長袖襯衫，長褲子和寬邊帽子。

sentences.english: I want to buy trousers with a slight taper .
sentences.chinese: 我想買褲腳稍瘦一些的長褲。

sentences.english: In my time players had short hair, wore long shorts, and played in hobnail boots.
sentences.chinese: 我那個時代，球員們留短髮，穿長褲和平頭釘的鞋。

sentences.english: Match black taper edition jeans, the whole individual seems to be highly lofty.
sentences.chinese: 搭配着黑色窄版長褲，整個人顯得極爲修長。

sentences.english: He wore a collared shirt and dark slacks.
sentences.chinese: 他穿着一件襯衫，一條黑長褲。

sentences.english: A smart black or navy blue pantsuit and white blouse is the best way to go.
sentences.chinese: 漂亮黑色或深藍色長褲套裝和白色襯衫是最好的搭配。

sentences.english: Match the top with a camisole and comfy pants.
sentences.chinese: 你可以用女裝背心和舒服的長褲來搭配。

sentences.english: I've got to get this shirt washed and ironed.
sentences.chinese: 我這些襯衫和長褲要乾洗和燙平。

sentences.english: Boys should wear collared shirts and dress pants.
sentences.chinese: 男生要穿有領襯衫和正裝長褲。
單色淺灰之長褲且褲腳不反折。

sentences.english: The temperature in the cave remains a constant 10 C. Sweaters and pants are highly recommended.
sentences.chinese: 洞內常年保持10攝氏度恆溫，強烈推薦穿長褲。

sentences.english: Hand me those pants in front of you.
sentences.chinese: 把在妳前面的那些長褲遞給我。
